title: Seki, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LRQ; LRQ
description: outside of a rest stop: retainers and attendants are preparing to continue on the journey; at L, men finish dressing, prepare lanterns, smoke, and chat in front of a structure partially covered with a large white cloth adorned with blue daimyo crests; a second group of men prepare near a large wooden gate; another large white curtain decorated with crests hangs at UR
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
